EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Publish, Secure and Monitor APIs with Pivotal Cloud Foundry Route Services
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/apis-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-route-services]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for today's webinar Publish, Secure and Monitor APIs with Pivotal Cloud Foundry Route Services.
Date: Wednesday, May 11, 2016 Time: 9:00amâ€“10:00am PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1181258/5FD14B05107F134B33F6762A70CDB2D6]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
We look forward to you joining us.
The Pivotal Team
